subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Rivals complain that the start of the network, a $300 million, 20-year deal with ESPN, further tilts recruiting in Texas’ favor and raises questions about the Big 12’s stability.
snippet: Rivals complain that the start of the network, a $300 million, 20-year deal with ESPN, further tilts recruiting in Texas’ favor and raises questions about the Big 12’s stability.
